dosageInstruction.text:
5 mcg/kg/min × 68 kg Dosing weight (rounded to 6.4 mL/hr), Intravenous, at 6.4 mL/hr, Continuous, Starting Tue 10/18/11 at 1415
Initiate dopamine drip if patient's systolic BP falls below 70 mmHG. Titrate to keep systolic BP above 90 mmHG. Increase in 2 mcg/kg/min increments. Do no exceed 20 mcg/kg/min. Discontinue dopamine if patient able to maintain MAP at 70 to 75 mmHG without dopamine infusion.

33.3 mL/hr (1 mg/min), Intravenous, Continuous, Starting Thu 12/30/10 at 1300
33ml/hr (1mg/min) x 6hrs, then 17ml/hr (0.5mg/min) x18hrs. After first 24 hours, order maintenance dose 0.5 mg/min.  Use in-line filter.
4 mcg/kg/min, Intravenous, Continuous, Starting Thu 12/30/10 at 1300
Take 10 mg by mouth daily., Until Discontinued, Historical Med
